roleset.name: lose (blood) quickly

role.descr: blood or substance lost (can be metaphorical)

example.name: both args
example.text: His hemorrhaging of blood was quickly control.

roleset.note: Based on Sharp data. Comparison to hemorrhage.01. Hemorrhage.01 is a member of VN class exhale-40.1.3-1. No FN class. Framed by Katie.
